overview: Chloe and her best friend Tommy have a plan. They are going to turn Tommy's family wilderness getaway into an interactive theatrical adventure.  When they arrive, however, they are greeted by an eccentric caretaker who tries to warn them of an evil that resides in the house. An insatiable who will stop at nothing to ravage and devour anyone who tries to defy her.  Will they be able to resist the seductions of their ethereal host or will they succumb to the erotic demands of Enigma?
title: Enigma
